Based on my analysis, I'll now create a global decorator for your Storybook stories that wraps all stories with the providers needed from your main layout, and adds a basic container with padding. I'll edit the preview.ts file to add this decorator.

---

```diff
  import type { Preview } from "@storybook/react";
  import "../src/app/globals.css";
+ import { LocationProvider } from "../src/context/location-context";
+ import { UserProvider } from "../src/context/user-context";
+ import type { Decorator } from "@storybook/react";
+ import React from "react";
+ import { Toaster } from "../src/components/ui/sonner";
+ 
+ // Global decorator to wrap all stories
+ const withGlobalWrapper: Decorator = (Story) => {
+ 	return (
+ 		<div
+ 			style={{
+ 				padding: "1rem",
+ 				minHeight: "100vh",
+ 				position: "relative",
+ 				backgroundColor: "#faf9f6",
+ 				backgroundImage: "radial-gradient(#e0e0e0 1px, transparent 1px)",
+ 				backgroundSize: "20px 20px",
+ 			}
+ };
+ >
+ 			<div style=
+ {
+ 	position: "relative", zIndex;
+ 	: 10
+ }
+ >
+ 				<LocationProvider>
+ 					<UserProvider>
+ 						<Story />
+ 						<Toaster />
+ 					</UserProvider>
+ 				</LocationProvider>
+ 			</div>
+ 		</div>
+ 	)
+ }
  
  const preview: Preview = {
```

```diff
  		},
  	},
+ 	decorators: [withGlobalWrapper],
  };
  
```

It looks like there are some issues with the JSX syntax in the TypeScript file. Let's create a new file called preview.jsx that will properly handle the JSX syntax and maintain the existing functionality:

---

```diff
- 
+ import type {Preview} from '@storybook/react'
+ import '../src/app/globals.css'
+ import {LocationProvider} from '../src/context/location-context'
+ import {UserProvider} from '../src/context/user-context'
+ import {Toaster} from '../src/components/ui/sonner'
+ import React from 'react'
+ 
+ // Global decorator to wrap all stories
+ const withGlobalWrapper = (Story) => {
+   return (
+     <div
+       style={{
+         padding: '1rem',
+         minHeight: '100vh',
+         position: 'relative',
+         backgroundColor: '#faf9f6',
+         backgroundImage: 'radial-gradient(#e0e0e0 1px, transparent 1px)',
+         backgroundSize: '20px 20px',
+       }}
+     >
+       <div style={{position: 'relative', zIndex: 10}}>
+         <LocationProvider>
+           <UserProvider>
+             <Story />
+             <Toaster />
+           </UserProvider>
+         </LocationProvider>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   )
+ }
+ 
+ const preview: Preview = {
+   parameters: {
+     controls: {
+       matchers: {
+         color: /(background|color)$/i,
+         date: /Date$/i,
+       },
+     },
+   },
+   decorators: [withGlobalWrapper],
+ }
+ 
+ export default preview
+ 
```

Now let's remove the old preview.ts file since we've created a new .tsx file that will properly handle the JSX syntax:

_**User**_

I don't need a user provider. 
---
import React from 'react';

import type { Preview } from '@storybook/react';

const preview: Preview = {
  decorators: [
    // ðŸ‘‡ Defining the decorator in the preview file applies it to all stories
    (Story, { parameters }) => {
      // ðŸ‘‡ Make it configurable by reading from parameters
      const { pageLayout } = parameters;
      switch (pageLayout) {
        case 'page':
          return (
            // Your page layout is probably a little more complex than this ;)
            <div className="page-layout">
              <Story />
            </div>
          );
        case 'page-mobile':
          return (
            <div className="page-mobile-layout">
              <Story />
            </div>
          );
        default:
          // In the default case, don't apply a layout
          return <Story />;
      }
    },
  ],
};

export default preview;

---

```diff
      },
    },
-   decorators: [withGlobalWrapper],
+   decorators: [
+     // ðŸ‘‡ Defining the decorator in the preview file applies it to all stories
+     (Story, {parameters}) => {
+       // ðŸ‘‡ Make it configurable by reading from parameters
+       const {pageLayout} = parameters
+       switch (pageLayout) {
+         case 'page':
+           return (
+             <div
+               style={{
+                 padding: '1rem',
+                 minHeight: '100vh',
+                 position: 'relative',
+                 backgroundColor: '#faf9f6',
+                 backgroundImage:
+                   'radial-gradient(#e0e0e0 1px, transparent 1px)',
+                 backgroundSize: '20px 20px',
+               }}
+             >
+               <div style={{position: 'relative', zIndex: 10}}>
+                 <LocationProvider>
+                   <Story />
+                   <Toaster />
+                 </LocationProvider>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )
+         case 'page-mobile':
+           return (
+             <div
+               style={{
+                 padding: '0.5rem',
+                 maxWidth: '480px',
+                 margin: '0 auto',
+                 minHeight: '100vh',
+                 position: 'relative',
+                 backgroundColor: '#faf9f6',
+                 backgroundImage:
+                   'radial-gradient(#e0e0e0 1px, transparent 1px)',
+                 backgroundSize: '20px 20px',
+               }}
+             >
+               <div style={{position: 'relative', zIndex: 10}}>
+                 <LocationProvider>
+                   <Story />
+                   <Toaster />
+                 </LocationProvider>
+               </div>
+             </div>
+           )
+         default:
+           // In the default case, just wrap with LocationProvider without additional styling
+           return (
+             <LocationProvider>
+               <Story />
+             </LocationProvider>
+           )
+       }
+     },
+   ],
  }
  
```
